AppPush.Title: Welcome to Collapse Launcher
AppPush.Message: Now you can install or migrate your existing game here. For more information/guides, please visit: https://github.com/neon-nyan/CollapseLauncher/Wiki

AppPush.Title: You are using Preview build
AppPush.Message: You're using preview build and might be unstable. To report any issues, please visit: https://github.com/neon-nyan/CollapseLauncher/issues

RegionPush.Title: Important Announcement Regarding to Genshin 2.8 Update Issue
RegionPush.Message: We would like to announce you that due to changes on Genshin's Dispatcher data structure, We have published 1.0.33.3-Hotfix build for both Stable and Preview channel to fix update failure issue for Genshin (at least for now). Thank you for your attention and apologize for the inconvenience.
